objects.text:
• Spacious stylish design with ample storage
• Premium faux leather construction
• Gold hardware with decorative chain charm

Perfect size for everyday essentials
10.9″ L x 4″ W x 12.4″ H

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, upscale design split into two soft-toned halves. The left side serves as the informational panel, while the right showcases a luxury tote bag image. The heading (`heading`) is bold and prominent, communicating the product's name in a stylish dark brown typeface. The subheading section (`subheading`) briefly lists product dimensions and qualities in an elegant serif font, suggesting sophistication. Key features are bulleted in the `description` layer, and price information (`price`) is emphasized with a large bold font. The call-to-action button (`cta`) is placed over a dark brown rectangle (`cta_background`) encouraging immediate engagement. The background includes soft diagonal split tones with minimal line art and decorative dots for a polished aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Beige: `#F5EFE6` (background left)
- Soft Peach: `#F1E4D8` (background right)
- Espresso Brown: `#6D4C41` (text/buttons)
- Warm Taupe: `#C19A6B` (brand and price)
- Soft Gold: `#D4AF7A` (highlights and subtext)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (CTA text)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm camel brown hue, offering a rich and elegant aesthetic. The main body of the bag is a soft, matte finish in a taupe-brown color (Hex: #B68C6A) that exudes warmth and luxury. Gold metallic accents (Hex: #D4AF37) are used for the chain, logo, and hardware details, providing a striking contrast that enhances the plushness of the brown base. These colors blend seamlessly yet stand out due to their material differences—matte vs. metallic. Complementary tones for the banner could include ivory (#F5F5DC), charcoal gray (#4D4D4D), and blush pink (#ECD9D9) to add elegance and balance.
